Container.Name: Airbridge
Container.Overview: Airbridge bridges DLNA/UPnP audio streams to AirPlay (RAOP) devices. [br][br] Creates virtual DLNA renderers that forward audio to AirPlay speakers, allowing media servers like Music Assistant or Plex to stream to AirPlay-only devices through DLNA. [br][br] Features: [br]- Virtual DLNA renderer per AirPlay zone [br]- Automatic AirPlay device discovery (mDNS) [br]- Web admin interface for managing devices [br]- Volume control support [br][br] Requires host network mode for mDNS device discovery and SSDP announcements.
